# Ergo Events

Ergo hosts a variety of events to engage with the community, share updates, and foster innovation. These events provide an excellent opportunity to learn more about Ergo, interact with the team, and contribute to the ecosystem. ## ERGOHACK and ERGOSUMMIT

Our flagship events, [ERGOHACK](ergohack.md) and [ERGOSUMMIT](ergosummit.md), are held regularly. These events bring together developers, enthusiasts, and thought leaders from the Ergo community. Visit the respective pages to learn more about past events and stay updated on upcoming ones.

sections.heading: Ergo Events
sections.content: Ergo hosts a variety of events to engage with the community, share updates, and foster innovation. These events provide an excellent opportunity to learn more about Ergo, interact with the team, and contribute to the ecosystem.

sections.heading: ERGOHACK and ERGOSUMMIT
sections.content: Our flagship events, ERGOHACK and ERGOSUMMIT, are held regularly. These events bring together developers, enthusiasts, and thought leaders from the Ergo community. Visit the respective pages to learn more about past events and stay updated on upcoming ones.

sections.heading: AMAs and Dev Updates
sections.content: We host weekly Ask Me Anything (AMAs) sessions and regular Developer Updates on Reddit. These sessions provide insights into Ergo's development progress and offer a platform for the community to ask questions directly to the team.

sections.heading: Join the Community
sections.content: To stay updated on all Ergo events, join our Discord community. You can also explore other community spaces to engage with Ergo enthusiasts from around the world.
